subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Kevin Harvick led on 224 of the 312 laps and pulled away on a series of late restarts Sunday for his second straight Sprint Cup win at Phoenix International Raceway in Avondale, Ariz.
snippet: Kevin Harvick led on 224 of the 312 laps and pulled away on a series of late restarts Sunday for his second straight Sprint Cup win at Phoenix International Raceway in Avondale, Ariz.
